title: Pia Muehlenbeck cuts a chic figure in a gold dress as she attends the Influencer Awards in Monaco
text:
She famously traded a promising career as a lawyer in favour of becoming an Instagram model and travel blogger five years ago.

And on Sunday, Pia Muehlenbeck stepped out on one of the glitziest red carpets as a nominee for the influencer of the year award at the Salle des Etoiles in Monaco.

The 28-year-old German beauty, who now calls Australia home, took to Instagram to share several photos of herself and her husband Kane Vato at the glamorous affair.

Golden girl! Pia Muehlenbeck (pictured) stepped out on one of the glitziest red carpets on Sunday as a nominee for the influencer of the year award at the Salle des Etoiles in Monaco

In one of the candid snaps, Pia cut a striking figure in an elaborate metallic gold Toni Maticevski gown, which featured a strapless bodice and flowing full length skirt.

Another photo shows the glamorous influencer standing alongside Kane, who looked dapper in a classic black tuxedo and bow tie.

Keeping in theme with her gown, Pia opted for a metallic makeup look consisting of copper eye shadow, well-defined brows and an over-lined amber lip.

Happy couple! One photo shows Pia (right) standing alongside husband Kane Vato (left), who looked dapper in a classic black tuxedo and bow tie

The model wore her sun-kissed brunette tresses in voluminous, textured waves, swept behind one ear with a side part.

She elevated her high-fashion red carpet look with an olive green YSL clutch and an understated ring and pair of gold earrings.

'What a blur! So... we didn’t win the Influencer of the Year Award, but we had the best adventure ever,' Pia wrote in the accompanying caption.

So humble! While she didn't win, Pia (right) concluded: 'This will be a weekend I’ll never forget... SO incredibly honoured to be nominated... here’s to maybe winning next year!'

'It was truly magical to make new friends with people that we had only ever seen and been inspired by online for years.'

She concluded: 'This will be a weekend I’ll never forget... SO incredibly honoured to be nominated... here’s to maybe winning next year!'

Pia and Kane tied the knot in December 2018, and while they enjoy living the high life for the time being, she admitted settling down with kids is definitively on the cards.

During an live Instagram Q&A session with fans earlier this year, Pia revealed her baby plans, saying she would ideally like to have two children in the future.
description: She famously traded a promising career as a lawyer in favour of becoming an Instagram model and travel blogger five years ago.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
